Name: The Inevitability
About the game: The main hero of the game was alone. All of his family died. He continued to cling to the life... but Death... seems trying to pick him up... Throughout the game something have been chasing and wants to send you to the other world to meet his family... and as if you were trying to hide it finds you... The question remains: It wants to help you or hurt? Game Features: ✔ A linear plot ✔ Deep atmosphere ✔ The cut scenes ✔ Professional voice acting with subtitles ✔ Trading card ✔ Badge ✔ Emoticons ✔ Profile backgrounds
